entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
